turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about List of Via Rail rolling stock.
turn.2: List of Via Rail rolling stock This is a list of past and present rolling stock owned and operated by Via Rail in Canada.
turn.3: How many does the company own?
turn.4: Via Rail owns 78 locomotives and 396 passenger cars.
turn.5: Is there a list of the cars and locomotives?
turn.6: The tables below list that equipment by type and include some information regarding previously-owned and operated equipment.
turn.7: When did the company start operations?
turn.8: When Via began operation in 1976–1978 it was with a collection of equipment inherited from the Canadian National Railway (CN) and Canadian Pacific Railway (CP).
turn.9: Is the equipment still in use?
turn.10: Much of this equipment remains in use today.
turn.11: Are they replaced with new equipment?
turn.12: Over the years Via has supplemented this initial fleet with new orders and with new acquisitions of secondhand equipment from other operators.
